name: Beat Trainer Deluxe
description:
Beat Trainer Deluxe is an easy and fun way to improve your timing, dexterity, and sense of rhythm, from the comfort of your home computer system! Simply press keys in time with the beat to enjoy hours of educational rhythm training entertainment!

This package comes complete with three stages of training for trainees of varying skill levels. Each stage also has a built in practice mode where, with the press of a button, a trainee can slow the speed of the beat to get extra practice on those tricky parts!

Begin your journey on the road to advanced rhythm aptitude today!
